sanskrit: """प्रत्याहारा: प्रथमान्तिमाक्षरयोर्मध्यस्थान सूत्रस्थान वर्णान प्रदर्शयन्ति। प्रत्याहारा: महर्षिपाणिनिरचितस्य अष्टाध्याय्या: माहेश्वरसूत्राणां प्रथमाक्षरेण अन्तिमाक्षरेण च मिलित्वा निर्मीयन्ते यथा- अक्, हल्, अच इत्यादय:।"""
english: """Pratyahara is bringing together; bringing together of several letters (or words in a few cases, such as roots or nouns) by mentioning the first and the last only for the sake of brevity; the term izR;kgkj is generally used in connection with brief terms such as v.k~] vd~] vp~] gy~ and the like, created by Panini in his grammar by taking any particular letter and associating it with any mute final letter (vuqcU/k) of the fourteen Sivasutras, with a view to include all letters beginning with the letter uttered and ending with the letter which precedes the (mute) letter."""

sanskrit: "अहं तान् सर्वान् अपि अभिनन्दामि, ये हि अस्य महतः रिक्थस्य संरक्षण-सम्वर्धनयोः निरताः सन्तः जन-सामान्य-पर्यन्तम् एतं प्रापयितुं संलग्नाः सन्ति |"
english: "I congratulate all those actively involved in preserving & conserving this glorious heritage, helping it to reach out to the masses."

sanskrit: पाठेऽस्मिन् वयं :  Custom exceptions  अपि च  throw तथा throws keywords अनयोः विनियोगञ्च ज्ञास्यामः ।
english: In this tutorial we will learn about:  Custom exceptions and  Usage of throw and throws keywords

sanskrit: दुष्टः प्रणश्यति ।
english: Rogue escapes.

sanskrit: dot slash val इति टङ्कयित्वा Enter नुदन्तु ।
english: "Now, type ./val (dot slash val). Press Enter."

sanskrit: दृष्टिगोचरीयपरिचर्य्यया मानुषेभ्यो रोचितुं मा यतध्वं किन्तु ख्रीष्टस्य दासा इव निविष्टमनोभिरीश्चरस्येच्छां साधयत।
english: """Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;"""

sanskrit: अधुना उपयुज्यमाने उपकरणे उपयोक्तुः id अपि च समूहस्य id द्रष्टुं शक्नुमः।
english: "Now, we can see the User IDs and Group IDs on the system that we are using."
